TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted, you are trapped in it and then used as a limitless source of energy, fueled by your pain (basically stuck in an infinite portal loop while your face hits a paddle wheel every time you go down)

i wish that my computer never lagged

Granted. Now it always crashes instead of lagging.

I wish that my internet was faster.

Granted. but your computer explodes

i wish for the magic boulder

Granted. However, your warranty becomes invalid due to aliens having a conversation on it. It quickly explodes, the fragments smashing your space helmet off.

I wish for more possessed bones (& Jim McCoy)

Granted but however they proceed to kill you sorry about that.

I wish I had a simply ,and amazing muffin.
Granted. They **** you.

I'm ignoring that last comment, as it has no wish.

Granted. The muffin is so amazing that you can't stand to eat it.

I wish for my internet to still be fast, but make the dial-up sound when it connects.

Granted. You may use your new, ultra fast dial up connection for one hour a day, the rest of the time you must keep the line free in case someone calls.(Thanks for the reminder of how far we've come )

I wish for Internet use to require a license, the test for which includes spelling, grammar, common sense, and how to identify and avoid logical fallacies.

Granted, but no one can use it now.

I wish i didnt forget to write wishes so often.

Granted - you will now forget only in half of your posts }:^3

I wish everyone suddenly realized that you're=you are and your=belongs to you.

...and not the other way around!

Granted. What a grammar Naz! you're!

I wish I could ignore grammatical errors better.

Granted - you now pay attention to only 98% of the ones you paid attention to until now }:^3

I wish everyone would now successfully pass a spelling exam. (a difficult one)

Granted! Now everyone has to study for 12 hours,

I wish I had 120kg of liquid oxygen for a rocket.

Granted but with all these skilled people the world suffers a job crisis ,and the global economy crashes causing the world to enter another great depression.

I wish every country was renamed based on the stars ,and constellations.

Granted but with all these skilled people the world suffers a job crisis ,and the global economy crashes causing the world to enter another great depression.

I wish every country was renamed based on the stars ,and constellations.

granted but UN creates a treaty that say's that only beatlejuice us available with the end result being all contry's having the same name and beatlejuice coming back

i wish for a hyperspace warpdrive in ksp

Granted. but it takes so much memory it kills you because your computer blows up.

I wish for juice made out of Equatorial Guineas.

Unfortunately guineas pigs are tired to give you more juice and cut your head.

i wish for a red iron crown .

Granted. It's rusty and worthless, not to mention that your head is bleeding. Also, it's ugly.

I wish for my speakers to work.

Granted, they start working while on full volume during a loud part of some youtube video. Your ears are no more.

I wish for solar panels.

granted there damaged beyond repair

i wish my mike would work

Granted, but there is an infinite dust cloud above it blocking the sun.

I wish for a nice doughnut.

granted there damaged beyond repair

i wish my mike would work

Granted, but there is an infinite dust cloud above it blocking the sun.

I wish for a nice doughnut.

Granted, Mike works and is eating the donut. Damn Mike.

I wish for an RTG battery for my laptop.

Granted. The radiation from having the RTG so close to your nether regions renders you sterile quickly and fills you with cancer slowly.

I wish for nine lives.

Granted - nine more people were just born!

I wish I had nine lives. ...and was not a cat.

granted but in a twist formed in the surgery you turn into a cat

i wish to be an ALL POWERFULL GENIE
